name: Bingo Runs
description:
BINGO RUNS

In this endless runner you are playing as a jester with a goal to get as far as possible. Your overall score is tracked by how far you can get and along the way you can find things like cards power-ups that will help you get farther but you will also find dangers that may try and stop you.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Press space to jump over obstacles. Collect cards to gain power-ups.
